XRSessionPreferredReflectionFormat.summary: The read-only preferredReflectionFormat property of the interface returns this session's preferred reflection format used for lighting estimation texture data.
XRSessionPreferredReflectionFormat.value:
A string representing the reflection format. Possible values:
XRReflectionFormatWebGL FormatWebGL Internal FormatWebGPU FormatHDR
"srgba8"RGBASRGB8_ALPHA8"rgba8unorm-srgb"
"rgba16f"RGBARGBA16F"rgba16float"âœ“
